segments.text: I see two children engaged in some secret activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed, and the stool looks very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, there's a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's clearly taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, with her hand raised, anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are quite a team in their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't tip over with him on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite daring to do this right behind an adult.
segments.speaker: PAR
